text: The Armenia women's national basketball team represents the Armenia in international women's basketball competitions. ==Competitive record== ===Women's European Championship for Small Countries=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%;" |- !Year !Position ! ! ! |- | 1998 || 7th || 5 || 2 || 3 |- bgcolor=9acdff | 2004 || Fourth place || 5 || 3 || 2 |- bgcolor=silver |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2010 || Runner-up || 5 || 4 || 1 |- ! colspan=2 align=left|Total !! 15 !! 9 !! 6 |} ==External links== *Profile at FIBA website Category:Women's national basketball teams Category:Women's national sports teams of Armenia Category:Armenia national basketball team
